column4: Hi, i tried the last ubuntu on my HP DV5 but i can't get the wifi to work(broadcom) an error when setting the key 'SetEncode' or something not working, anyone got this wifi card to work?
I did. It was long ago, but I basically had to blacklist broadcom and use ndiswrapper to get it working. I believe I haven't had to do that with lucid
ha ok, y ea i read about ndiswrapper...ok thanks for the info
